name: American Outlaws 3: 1984
description:
Controls:

  • AD/Directional arrows - Steer
  • Left Click - Primary Weapon
  • Right Click - Secondary Weapon
  • Left Shift - Boost

Time warp update: Introducing new time warp mechanics, 4 new iconic cars, destructible props, police choppers and fixed all major bugs.

The year is 1984. Criminal overlord Roberto has the city entirely under his control. After some bank robbers steal from an armoured truck, they must fight to survive and liberate the people with the stolen cash.

Recommended Specs: Intel i7, 16GB RAM

Minimum Specs: Intel i5, 8GB RAM

WARNING: "Take a pill" option may cause nausea and epileptic seizures.
